title: 111_hr6070
content: SECTION 1. ESTABLISHMENT OF RESERVATION. The Act amends Section 1 to allow the Secretary to accept additional real property within the boundaries of the original 1857 reservation of the Confederated Tribes of the Grand Ronde Community of Oregon. The Act allows the Secretary to treat reservations as on-reservation trust acquisitions and accept real property within the boundaries of the Tribe's reservation. Tax lot 800 5.55'' - Amendment to insert new matter in place of struck text. Former tax lot 800, 5.55'' located within specific sections. The text chunk refers to amendments in subsections (D) and (E) by changing specific numerical values and removing text in subsection (c). The text chunk provides details about various land parcels with specific measurements and directions, such as W \1/2\, SE 20.6 and NE \1/4\, SW 12.99. These details seem to be related to property descriptions or land divisions. The text chunk describes different land parcels with specific measurements and directions, including SW \1/4\, NW 37.99 and NE \1/4\, NW 24.87. These details appear to be related to property descriptions or land divisions. Section 8 describes land parcels with specific measurements and directions, totaling 10,599.66 acres.
